Html:
Dim folder As TaskFolder
folder.createfolder("name")

 

gives me this error

'CreateFolder' is ambiguous because multiple kinds of members with this name exist in class 'Microsoft.Win32.TaskScheduler.TaskFolder'

 

edit: 1.6.2 and 1.5 gives this error, 1.4.2 no error
You've found a bug. I will fix this in 1.6.3. For now, to remove this error, you can just pass in the VB equivalent of (string)null as a second parameter.
